problem.markdown:
1. What is SPI ? ( ) Serial Parallel Interface ( ) Serial Programmable Interface ( ) Service Provider Interface (x) Serial peripheral Interface
2. The port used for programming microcontroller is __ ( ) Parallel ( ) Serial ( ) USB (x) All of the above
3. TO attain good resolution of machining the preferred dot per inches(dpi) are ( ) 200 (x) 500 ( ) 700 ( ) 1000
4. The GAVRASM software is used for (x) Assembling and compiling hex ( ) Uploading file into MCU ( ) To execute file ( ) All of the above
5. avrDude is use for ( ) TO Compile hex file (x) To Upload hex file into microcontroller ( ) To create the obeject file ( ) can't say
problem.p: 2. The port used for programming microcontroller is __

4. The GAVRASM software is used for

choicegroup.choice: To Upload hex file into microcontroller
